alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL MERCED AND WEST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM PST... At 159 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Los Banos, or 24 miles southwest of Atwater, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief heavy rain. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Los Banos, Dos Palos, San Luis Dam, and San Luis National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains north of 198
